name: Triage (acaves90, Harlem E, KING-REBEL, Jacqueline Holdaway)
name_original: Triage (acaves90, Harlem E, KING-REBEL, Jacqueline Holdaway)
description:
This game is a first person simulation game where the player is assigned as a Registered Nurse in a busy metropolitan hospital. Your job is to triage patients and send the patients to the appropriate location within the Emergency Department for treatment. This game is aimed at training nursing staff who are learning the triaging processes. 

Features
  • Based on the Australian Triage Scoring System.
  • Goes through the ABCDDE and AMPLE systems.
  • Realistic patient scenarios.
  • Interactive equipment (in development not currently added) and patient interviews.

Note: Currently the setting menu in-game does not function. This game is currently in development. 

This game is currently still in development. Please take the time to fill out the playtesting form: https://forms.gle/KfrwoZjoktpZxm7C9

This game was made for a University project.
